definitions.definition: A part of culture that is passed from person to person or generation to generation, possibly differing in detail from family to family, such as the way to celebrate holidays.
A commonly held system. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
An established or distinctive style or method:
The act of delivering into the hands of another; delivery .

main_definition: A part of culture that is passed from person to person or generation to generation, possibly differing in detail from family to family, such as the way to celebrate holidays.
